unnormalised: Campus hiring season is crucial for talent acquisition, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. We at ABC Corp aim to onboard fresh graduates on 15/06/2024. Focus should be on relevant skillsets and cultural fit. Expecting strong participation from colleges across Chennai. Initial salaries starting at Rs. 6,00,000. Onboarding session scheduled for 01/07/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Don't miss the 28/02/2024 deadline! Looking forward to meeting future stars.
normalised: Campus hiring season is crucial for talent acquisition, especially from institutions like I I T Delhi. We at A B C Corp aim to onboard fresh graduates on fifteenth june two thousand and twenty four. Focus should be on relevant skillsets and cultural fit. Expecting strong participation from colleges across Chennai. Initial salaries starting at rupees six hundred thousand. Onboarding session scheduled for first july two thousand and twenty four at ten hundred hours. Do not miss the twenty eighth february two thousand and twenty four deadline!
